        public ArrayList<Path> phoneticize(ArrayList<String> entry,
                          int nbest)
        Phoneticize a word
        Parameters:
        entry - the word to phoneticize transformed to an ArrayList of Strings (each element hold a single character)
        nbest - the number of distinct pronunciations to return
        Returns:
        the pronunciation(s) of the input word
